Description: Green glazed composition shabti of the vizier Neferrenpet with black painted detail: a short wig with a side-lock, a modelled face with traced features and widely spaced parallel hands in relief holding two hoes; the leg section is inscribed with five rows of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
